name: EZRA: The Stranger
description:
EZRA: The Stranger

An adventurous journey of the Stranger begins with unexpected UFO crash.

He will have to face unfamiliar Earth creatures and human made mechanisms.

His name is EZRA.

Features:

  • Unique puzzles
  • Live enemies
  • Stunning animations
  • Charming backgrounds and locations
  • Intro storytelling comics
And lots of more...

Give it a try and have fun!
